sentences.sContent: He has cloistered himself in a monastery for more than thirty years.
sentences.sContent_eng: He has cloistered himself in a monastery for more than thirty years.
sentences.sCn: 他隐居于修道院中已三十余年。

sentences.sContent: The only regular visitors to the monastery in winter are parties of skiers who go there at Christmas and Easter.
sentences.sContent_eng: The only regular visitors to the monastery in winter are parties of skiers who go there at Christmas and Easter.
sentences.sCn: 冬天常来修道院参观的只有一批批滑雪者。 他们在圣诞节或复活节到那儿去。

words.tran: 修道院的；僧尼的；庙宇的
修道院生活；禁欲主义；出家；隐修制度

trans.tranOther: a place where  monk s  live
